variable.name: subject_ID
variable.description: CIDR Individual Phenotype ID; INDIV ID in the CIDR files

variable.name: site
variable.description: Country where the subject is from

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Sex of participant

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age of participant at the time of enrollment
variable.comment: 0 represents babies who are under 12 months of age

variable.name: ethnicity
variable.description: Hispanic/Latino participant

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of Participant
variable.value: Caucasian, African American, and Native American
Native American, Alaskan Native, or Other Native People

variable.name: clefttype
variable.description: Type of cleft of participant
variable.comment: Derived from on other affection fields.

variable.name: CaseVsControlFamilyStatus
variable.description: Case or Control family
variable.value: Control or Member of Control Family
Case or Member of Case Family

variable.name: OORating
variable.description: Rating of OO muscle
variable.comment: OO muscle discontinuity rating: Consensus score assigned by three independent raters, blinded to the CLP status of the subject. Equals 4 if OORight and/or OOLeft and/or OOMidline equals 1.

variable.name: OORight
variable.description: Score assigned to right side of OOM
variable.comment: OO muscle discontinuity score, right side of OO muscle: assigned by three independent raters, blinded to the CLP status of the subject.

variable.name: OOLeft
variable.description: Score assigned to left side of OOM
variable.comment: OO muscle discontinuity score, left side of OO muscle: assigned by three independent raters, blinded to the CLP status of the subject.

variable.name: OOMidline
variable.description: Score assigned to midline of OOM
variable.comment: OO muscle discontinuity score, midline side of OO muscle: assigned by three independent raters, blinded to the CLP status of the subject.

variable.name: LipRating
variable.description: Rating of Lower Lip
variable.comment: Lower Lip Print Whirl: Derived by assigning 0 to those with 0 for BOTH LipLowerLeftRating and LipLowerRightRating; 1 to those with LipLowerLeftRating and/or LipLowerRightRating equal to 6, 61, 62, or 63; 99 to those with both LipLowerLeftRating and LipLowerRightRating equal to 99.

variable.name: LipLowerLeftRating
variable.description: Score assigned to Lower Left Lip
variable.comment: Consensus score assigned by three independent raters, blinded to the CLP status of the subject.

variable.name: LipLowerRightRating
variable.description: Score assigned to Lower Right Lip
variable.comment: Consensus score assigned by three independent raters, blinded to the CLP status of the subject.

variable.name: BorderlineVPI
variable.description: Borderline VPI closure
variable.comment: Assigned based on perceptual VPI screening by speech language pathologist.
variable.value: Evidence of at least borderline VPI

variable.name: MaxCranWidth
variable.description: Maximum Cranial Length; Standard nomenclature definition - (eu-eu)

variable.name: MinFrntWidth
variable.description: Minimum Frontal Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (ft-ft)

variable.name: MaxFaceWidth
variable.description: Maximum Face Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (zy-zy)

variable.name: MandWidth
variable.description: Mandible Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (go-go)

variable.name: MaxCranLength
variable.description: Maximum Cranial Length; Standard nomenclature definition - (g-op)

variable.name: CranBaseWidth
variable.description: Cranial Base Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (t_R - t_L)

variable.name: UpFaceDepth_R
variable.description: Upper Facial Depth Right; Standard nomenclature definition - (n - t_R)

variable.name: UpFaceDepth_L
variable.description: Upper Facial Depth Left; Standard nomenclature definition - (n - t_L)

variable.name: MidFaceDepth_R
variable.description: Middle Facial Depth Right; Standard nomenclature definition - (sn - t_R)

variable.name: MidFaceDepth_L
variable.description: Middle Facial Depth Left; Standard nomenclature definition - (sn - t_L)

variable.name: LowFaceDepth_R
variable.description: Lower Facial Depth Right; Standard nomenclature definition - (gn - t_R)

variable.name: LowFaceDepth_L
variable.description: Lower Facial Depth Left; Standard nomenclature definition - (gn - t_L)

variable.name: MorphFaceHeight
variable.description: Morphological Facial Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (n - gn)

variable.name: UpFaceHeight
variable.description: Upper Facial Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (n - sto)

variable.name: LowFaceHeight
variable.description: Lower Facial Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (sn - gn)

variable.name: InCanthWidth
variable.description: Intercanthal Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (en_R - en_L)

variable.name: OutCanthWidth
variable.description: Outercanthal width (ex_R - ex_L)

variable.name: PalpFisLength_R
variable.description: Palpebral Fissure Length Right; Standard nomenclature definition - (en_R - ex_R)

variable.name: PalpFisLength_L
variable.description: Palpebral Fissure Length Left; Standard nomenclature definition - (en_L - ex_L)

variable.name: NasalWidth
variable.description: Nasal Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (al_R - al_L)

variable.name: SubNasalWidth
variable.description: Subnasal Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (sbal_R - sbal_L)

variable.name: NasalPro
variable.description: Nasal Protrusion; Standard nomenclature definition - (sn - prn)

variable.name: NasalAlaLength_R
variable.description: Nasal Ala Length Right; Standard nomenclature definition - (ac_R - prn)

variable.name: NasalAlaLength_L
variable.description: Nasal Ala Length Left; Standard nomenclature definition - (ac_L - prn)

variable.name: NasalHeight
variable.description: Nasal Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (n - sn)

variable.name: NasalBdgLength
variable.description: Nasal Bridge Length; Standard nomenclature definition - (n - prn)

variable.name: LabFisWidth
variable.description: Labial Fissure Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (ch_R - ch_L)

variable.name: PhilWidth
variable.description: Philtrum Width; Standard nomenclature definition - (cph_R - cph _L)

variable.name: PhilLength
variable.description: Philtrum Length; Standard nomenclature definition - (sn - ls)

variable.name: UpLipHeight
variable.description: Upper Lip Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (sn - sto)

variable.name: LowLipHeight
variable.description: Lower Lip Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (sto - sl)

variable.name: UpVermHeight
variable.description: Upper Vermilion Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (ls - sto)

variable.name: LowVermHeight
variable.description: Lower vermilion height (sto - li)

variable.name: CutLowLipHeight
variable.description: Cutaneous Lower Lip Height; Standard nomenclature definition - (li - sl)

variable.name: MotherSmokePrior
variable.description: Mother smoke 3 months prior to pregnancy

variable.name: MotherSmoke3Months
variable.description: Mother smoke in first 3 months of pregnancy

variable.name: MotherSmoke
variable.description: Mother smoke in the perinatal period (3 months prior through 3rd month of pregnancy)
variable.comment: Derived from MotherSmokePrior and MotherSmoke3Months; 0 is assigned when both MotherSmokePrior=0 and MotherSmoke3Month=0; 1 is assigned when either MotherSmokePrior=1 OR MotherSmoke3Months= 1; -8888 is assigned when either MotherSmokePrior=-8888 or MotherSmoke3Months=-8888 and neither=1; -9999 is assigned when both MotherSmokePrior and MotherSmoke3Months=-9999

variable.name: MotherVitaminsPrior
variable.description: Mother took vitamins 3 months prior to pregnancy

variable.name: MotherVitamins3Months
variable.description: Mother took vitamins in first 3 months of pregnancy

variable.name: MotherVitamins
variable.description: Mother took vitamins in the perinatal period (3 months prior through 3rd month of pregnancy)
variable.comment: Derived from MotherVitaminsPrior and MotherVitamins3Months; 0 is assigned when both MotherVitaminsPrior=0 and MotherVitamins3Months=0; 1 is assigned when either MotherVitaminsPrior=1 OR MotherVitamins3Months= 1; -8888 is assigned when either MotherVitaminsPrior=-8888 or MotherVitamins3Months=-8888 and neither=1; -9999 is assigned when both MotherVitaminsPrior and MotherVitamins3Months=-9999

variable.name: MotherAlcoholPrior
variable.description: Mother drank alcohol 3 months prior to pregnancy

variable.name: MotherAlcohol3Months
variable.description: Mother drank alcohol in first 3 months of pregnancy

variable.name: MotherAlcohol
variable.description: Mother drank alcohol in the perinatal period (3 months prior through 3rd month of pregnancy)
variable.comment: Derived from MotherAlcoholPrior and MotherAlcohol3Months; 0 is assigned when both MotherAlcoholPrior=0 and MotherAlcohol3Months=0; 1 is assigned when either MotherAlcoholPrior=1 OR MotherAlcohol3Months= 1; -8888 is assigned when either MotherAlcoholPrior=-8888 or MotherAlcohol3Months=-8888 and neither=1; -9999 is assigned when both MotherAlcoholPrior and MotherAlcohol3Months=-9999
